recipe.title: GoT Cocktails: Winter Is Here Dark Stout Beer Milkshake

steps.step: Place a pint glass or stein in the freezer to chill while you make the milkshake.
In a blender, combine the ice cream and beer. Blend on medium speed until fully combined.
Drizzle the chocolate syrup around the inside of the chilled glass. Pour in the ice cream–beer blend to fill.
Top with whipped cream and drizzle with more chocolate syrup.

In a blender, combine the ice cream and beer.
Blend on medium speed until fully combined.
Drizzle the chocolate syrup around the inside of the chilled glass.
Pour in the ice cream–beer blend to fill.
Top with whipped cream and drizzle with more chocolate syrup.
